headline: AI Is Sliding and Everything Else Has Run Up. Here Are 6 Stocks That Look Like Buys.
summary: It can seem like a nothing-to-buy market. But there are solid stocks out there. We find six of them, from beer to jelly to oil and car parts.

headline: Is the Warren Buffett Correction Coming? Buy His 4 Safest Dividend Stocks Now
summary: Warren Buffett stepped down as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway on December 31, 2025, after six decades leading the conglomerate he transformed from a struggling textile mill into a $1 trillion empire. The “Oracle of Omaha” left his successor, Greg Abel, with a very concentrated portfolio: more than 65% of Berkshire’s $381 billion portfolio is invested ... Is the Warren Buffett Correction Coming? Buy His 4 Safest Dividend Stocks Now
